item.title: Bricks & Cantrips
item.author: chasestevenspersonal+bricks@gmail.com
item.description: Welcome! I hope you found it okay. I would like to introduce you to Bricks & Cantrips, a blog dedicated to game design within card games. Popular topics will run the gamut from stalwarts of the genre like Magic the Gathering and Slay the Spire to the classics like Poker and Uno. If it has cards and is a game, we can take a look. What is it about card games that makes them so fun to play?
